}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[http://www.embeddedworks.net/wlan330.html AW-NH387 SDIO module on '''EmbeddedWorks'''] :AzureWave AW-NH387 802.11b/g/n + Bluetooth 3.0 + FM :[[Marvell]] 88W8787 chipset :Embedded Works P/N: EW7830CB :Operating Temp: -20 ~ +70C
*[http://referencedesigner.com/blog/aw-nh387-for-low-cost-wifi-and-bluetooth-on-i-mx6/2805/ AW-NH387 module on '''ReferenceDesigner'''] :AW-NH387 (LGA), AW-NH387L (QFN)
